Shawn Mendes

  • 1998-Born in Pickering, Ontario, Canada
  • 2013-He gained popularity by posting song covers on Vine.
  • 2014-He signed a deal with Island Records A&R Ziggy Chareton. His self-titled debut EP was released the same year.
  • 2015-His debut studio album Handwritten was released the following year. The album debuted in the US Billboard 200, making him one of five artist to debut before age 18
  • 2016-His second studio album Illuminate with singles "Treat You Better" and "There's Nothing Holding Me Back". Mendes graduated from Pine Ridge Secondary School that same year in June, where he played both ice hockey and soccer and joinedd his high school glee club.
  • 2018-His self-titled third studio album was lead by the single "In My Blood". The a;bum's number one debut made Shawn the third-youngest artist to achieve three number one albums.
  • 2019-He released "If I Can't Have You" and Señorita, with Señorita topping the US Billboard Hot 100.
  • 2020-His fourth album Wonder made him the youngest male artist to top the Billboard 200 with four studio albums. To date he has won 13 SOCAN awards, 10 MTV Europe Music Awards, eight Juno Awards, eight iHeartRadio MMVAs, two AMAs, and received a total of three nominations for a Grammy Award
For more infornation you can check out the wikipedia page Shawn Mendes
